section_title: RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN OZONE AND CLIMATE EFFORTS
sentences: Delegates considered this agenda item in the SBSTA Plenary on Friday, 7 June.

Chair Thorgeirsson recalled COP-5 decision 17/CP.5 requesting information on available and potential ways and means of limiting emissions of hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) and perfluorocarbons (PFCs), including their use as replacements for ozone-depleting substances.

On Thursday, 13 June, Richard Bradley (US), briefed the SBSTA Plenary on informal consultations he had conducted on the topic, noting agreement on the value of a balanced information package and a process for recommending a draft COP-8 decision at SB-17.
He informed the SBSTA that agreement had been reached, with the exception of a G-77/China proposal to amend three references in the text to relate specifically to 'Annex I' Parties.
Following further informal consultations on this proposal, a compromise was reached and SBSTA adopted amended draft conclusions.
